name: MISSING ON MISSION
description:
A soldier has lost his platoon and finds himself traped inside the lost and found box. To  get out, he has to navigate through a series of obstacles and gather key objects that will allow him to build his escape vehicle. Let's hope he finishes his mission before he cannot longer join his captain and peers!

CREDITS; 

Unity Developper; Santiago Rubio
Art; Isabel Medina 
Music; Yoel Sanchez
Game Design; Anthony Fuentes

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrowkeys - move

Space bar - jump

C -  crowch

E - Interact
